attributes.action: We call upon the government to set realistic targets for annual net migration.
attributes.additional_details: This issue is the number one concern of huge swathes of the country and failure to manage it underpins many of our economic and societal problems. Goals should be SMART- specific, measurable, achievable, realistic and time-phased. The government rhetoric on this key issue meets none of the criteria for a plan.
attributes.background: We want the government to have a proper plan to manage legal and illegal migration. This is missing from the government’s milestones, and without a realistic, measurable target, it is not a serious plan. Without a goal, this is mere rhetoric and the British public deserves better.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/706038
